name: Polynomial.mem_map_rangeS
initialProofState:
R : Type u
S : Type v
inst✝¹ : Semiring R
inst✝ : Semiring S
f : RingHom R S
p : Polynomial S
⊢ Iff (Membership.mem (Polynomial.mapRingHom f).rangeS p) (∀ (n : Nat), Membership.mem f.rangeS (p.coeff n))
decl:
theorem mem_map_rangeS {p : S[X]} : p ∈ (mapRingHom f).rangeS ↔ ∀ n, p.coeff n ∈ f.rangeS := by
  constructor
  · rintro ⟨p, rfl⟩ n
    rw [coe_mapRingHom, coeff_map]
    exact Set.mem_range_self _
  · intro h
    rw [p.as_sum_range_C_mul_X_pow]
    refine (mapRingHom f).rangeS.sum_mem ?_
    intro i _hi
    rcases h i with ⟨c, hc⟩
    use C c * X ^ i
    rw [coe_mapRingHom, Polynomial.map_mul, map_C, hc, Polynomial.map_pow, map_X]

name: Polynomial.mem_map_range
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
S : Type u_2
inst✝¹ : Ring R
inst✝ : Ring S
f : RingHom R S
p : Polynomial S
⊢ Iff (Membership.mem (Polynomial.mapRingHom f).range p) (∀ (n : Nat), Membership.mem f.range (p.coeff n))
decl:
theorem mem_map_range {R S : Type*} [Ring R] [Ring S] (f : R →+* S) {p : S[X]} :
    p ∈ (mapRingHom f).range ↔ ∀ n, p.coeff n ∈ f.range :=
  mem_map_rangeS f
